member.name: P:Xamarin.Plugin.Calendar.Controls.Calendar.DisableSwipeDetection
member.summary: Disables the swipe detection (needs testing on iOS) Could be useful if your superview has its own swipe-detection logic. Also see if , , , or is useful to you.

member.name: P:Xamarin.Plugin.Calendar.Interfaces.IPersonalizableDayEvent.EventIndicatorColor
member.summary: Color to use as indicator when there are events on the day if the EventIndicatorColor is null then the general EventIndicatorColor of the Calendar will be used

member.name: P:Xamarin.Plugin.Calendar.Interfaces.IPersonalizableDayEvent.EventIndicatorSelectedColor
member.summary: Color to use as indicator when the day is selected and there are events on the day, if this is null then the EventIndicatorColor is used, if the EventIndicatorColor is null then the general EventIndicatorSelectedColor of the Calendar will be used

member.name: P:Xamarin.Plugin.Calendar.Interfaces.IPersonalizableDayEvent.EventIndicatorTextColor
member.summary: Color for text to use as indicator when there are events on the day if the EventIndicatorTextColor is null then the general EventIndicatorTextColor of the Calendar will be used

member.name: P:Xamarin.Plugin.Calendar.Interfaces.IPersonalizableDayEvent.EventIndicatorSelectedTextColor
member.summary: Color for text to use as indicator when the day is selected and there are events on the day, if this is null then the EventIndicatorTextColor is used, if the EventIndicatorSelectedTextColor is null then the general EventIndicatorSelectedTextColor of the Calendar will be used

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class that is empty, has the default initial capacity, and uses the default equality comparer for the key type.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class that is empty, has the specified initial capacity, and uses the default equality comparer for the key type.
member.param: The initial number of elements that the can contain.

member.name: M:Xamarin.Plugin.Calendar.Models.EventCollection.Remove(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Removes a collection of values for specific date
member.returns: true if the element is successfully found and removed; otherwise, false. This method returns false if key is not found in the System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2.

member.name: M:Xamarin.Plugin.Calendar.Models.EventCollection.Add(System.DateTime,System.Collections.ICollection)
member.summary: Add collection of values for specific date

member.name: P:Xamarin.Plugin.Calendar.Models.EventCollection.Item(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Gets/sets collection of values for specific date

member.name: M:Xamarin.Plugin.Calendar.Models.EventCollection.ContainsKey(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Checks if dictionary already has collection for specific date
member.returns: true if dictionary already has the date as key; otherwise, false

member.name: M:Xamarin.Plugin.Calendar.Models.EventCollection.TryGetValue(System.DateTime,System.Collections.ICollection@)
member.summary: Gets the value associated with the specific date
member.param: The date for the value to get
If the date exists then this is the associated collection; otherwise, it will be the default value of ICollection
member.returns: true if dictionary contains an element with the specified date; otherwise false
